sub_workout_group.name: Beginner Powerlifting Foundations Routine
sub_workout_group.description: A structured program to develop strength and technique for squats, bench press, and deadlifts.

sub_workouts.name: Back Squat
sub_workouts.description: Focus on full range of motion and proper form with a moderate weight.

sub_workouts.name: Bench Press
sub_workouts.description: Develop pressing strength with controlled tempo and full range of motion.

sub_workouts.name: Deadlift
sub_workouts.description: Maintain a neutral spine and proper hip hinge mechanics.

sub_workouts.name: Seated Row
sub_workouts.description: Strengthen the upper back to support pulling mechanics.

sub_workouts.name: Plank Hold
sub_workouts.description: Build core stability to improve squat and deadlift performance.

sub_workout_group.name: Squat & Deadlift Strength Routine
sub_workout_group.description: A specialized routine focusing on building maximum strength in the squat and deadlift.

sub_workouts.name: Low-Bar Squat
sub_workouts.description: Develop strength by shifting the bar lower on the back for greater leverage.

sub_workouts.name: Conventional Deadlift
sub_workouts.description: Lift heavier weights while maintaining a strong hip drive.

sub_workouts.name: Good Mornings
sub_workouts.description: Strengthen posterior chain muscles, improving hip hinge strength.

sub_workouts.name: Front Squats
sub_workouts.description: Improve quad strength and upper back stability for better squat mechanics.

sub_workouts.name: Romanian Deadlifts
sub_workouts.description: Build hamstring strength and hip mobility.

sub_workout_group.name: Bench Press & Upper Body Power Routine
sub_workout_group.description: A specialized upper body routine designed to increase pressing strength.

sub_workouts.name: Comp Bench Press
sub_workouts.description: Perform the bench press with full range of motion and competition setup.

sub_workouts.name: Close-Grip Bench Press
sub_workouts.description: Focus on triceps strength to improve lockout.

sub_workouts.name: Overhead Press
sub_workouts.description: Build shoulder and triceps strength to assist pressing power.

sub_workouts.name: Weighted Dips
sub_workouts.description: Strengthen the chest and triceps with a weighted dip variation.

sub_workouts.name: Barbell Rows
sub_workouts.description: Strengthen the upper back to support pressing mechanics.

sub_workout_group.name: Explosive Powerlifting Speed Routine
sub_workout_group.description: Speed-focused variations of the Big Three lifts to develop bar speed and explosiveness.

sub_workouts.name: Speed Deadlifts
sub_workouts.description: Perform fast, explosive reps with moderate weight.

sub_workouts.name: Dynamic Effort Box Squats
sub_workouts.description: Perform squats to a box to enhance rate of force development.

sub_workouts.name: Speed Bench Press
sub_workouts.description: Use a controlled eccentric phase followed by an explosive press.

sub_workouts.name: Banded Deadlifts
sub_workouts.description: Attach resistance bands to a deadlift for accommodating resistance.

sub_workouts.name: Broad Jumps
sub_workouts.description: Develop explosive power through maximum-effort jumps.

sub_workout_group.name: Super Powerlifting Max Strength Routine
sub_workout_group.description: Elite-level program designed for maximal strength and competition performance.

sub_workouts.name: 1-Rep Max Squat Attempt
sub_workouts.description: Work up to a heavy single at 90-100% of max.

sub_workouts.name: 1-Rep Max Bench Press Attempt
sub_workouts.description: Work up to a heavy single at 90-100% of max.
